Description: Wheelmade sherd of the upper part of a collared bowl, with a pointed rim and double carination below. Nile silt fabric, exterior covered in red slip . Decorated with black painted guilloche border with a line underneath below rim. Upper body divided into panels delineated by double lines forming boxes, divided by a vertical line of guilloche patterning. Two boxes are visible on the sherd, the left containing a painted bird, the right containing two lines forming an unclear motif.
